column4: question: i'm trying to enable a component called 'universe', so i type enable universe, then it tells me to "sudo apt-get install udo", but then it tells me "Couldn't find package udo"
sounds like you want to add the universe repo.add it in system -> software sources
ftp is a defacto standard so use an ftp client in your ubuntu
its a different protocol
but it will work?
if the server supports both then great, otherwise you will need to use ftp
thank you :) i will try...
it worked! thanks a bunch
